directions: Place strawberries, banana and yogurt in blender container. Pulse until fruit is well blended, scraping sides of container, if necessary.
Add ice; pulse until ice is well blended.
Pour into glass and top with one serving (2 tablespoons) Reddi-wip. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/4 cup vanilla nonfat yogurt with low-calorie sweetener
title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie from Reddi-wip®
